website_summaries.verdict: This affordable and versatile product can double as a core trainer for adults and wiggle seat for children.
pros: Works well for both adults, children, and older kids, allowing family sharing
Sixteen inches in diameter for comfortable seating anywhere
cons: A few adults find disc oversized for their needs but perfect for wiggling children

customer_reviews.title: like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: so glad i bought this. i sit for way too long for work on my conputer and hate it- this totaly helps posture wise, spine and glutes of course. not a work out, but at least some sort of stimulation. only tip or recommendation is to put a pillow case/towel over top as a cover unless you always wear pants, the plastic coating and ridges can be a bit uncomfortable after a while of sitting- if u sit for long periods like I do.
customer_reviews.author: tifani stegehuis

customer_reviews.title: Deflated - the item and myself
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it's fair to give it a one-star review for this, but the item arrived deflated, which isn't uncommon according to the reviews. However, I was also unable to inflate mine using three different pumps. Additionally, it arrived looking like it was used or damaged. There was an indentation on it that wouldn't have been caused by shipping.
customer_reviews.author: S. N. Shively

customer_reviews.title: Great solution instead of going to a full balance ball chair
customer_reviews.text: The perfect solution for active sitting in an office setting. I had hip surgery and needed a softer solution, but also one that would keep my muscles more active because I would get SO STIFF when sitting at work, and getting up each time was more painful than the last. That is now gone.
customer_reviews.author: bluediamond

customer_reviews.title: This thing is cool..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after our billing clerk showed up with one and used it for a while. I borrowed her computer a weeks ago, used her chair, thought wow, okay, so yeah. This thing is cool... you can't slouch and sit on it, and you can feel it working that core just after a few minutes. I work an office job 8-5 M-F but also have owned horses for the past three years and have started riding more and more as I've improved in the saddle. I bought this because I think it will help build my core and improve my posture and balance while at work, which my horses will thank me for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It's Large!
customer_reviews.text: This works for me. I had been sitting on an old steno chair that had the seat "sat out." The cushion filled in the sunken area an provides a good cushion. If it wasn't said anywhere else it should be emphasized that it's 17-18 inches across and about 2.5 inches high without additional air.
customer_reviews.author: Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Arrived deflated - defective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived almost completely deflated. It is supposed to be shipped inflated. I purchased for a chronic back issue and was unable to inflate it myself, so had to wait until I could ask someone else to do it. Needless to say, so far it has been disappointing. Update- the item was defective and unable to be inflated. In addition, the needle sent for inflation was broken. Returning and trying again...
customer_reviews.author: Melcjm

customer_reviews.title: I have started to notice a lot of back pain and poor posture. Along with this I have started to ...
customer_reviews.text: So since I sit at a desk for 8 hours a day, 5 days a week, I have started to notice a lot of back pain and poor posture. Along with this I have started to notice some breakouts on my chin because I slouch in my chair and lean on my hand. To solve this I thought about buying a yoga ball to replace my office chair, but instead I bought this disk. It is my first day using it and after just five minutes of using it, I am LOVING it. It forces you to "actively sit," sit up straight with both feet on the floor. No more slouching, no more leaning and no more back pain! #win
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hull

customer_reviews.title: my tailbone hurt worse. A friend had one and was wanting another ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me. I tried a few days, my tailbone hurt worse. A friend had one and was wanting another for home. She bought mine so I would not have to return. She likes this products, it did not help me. So it is a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a balance ball chair at home I love. When I started a new job, I wasn't allowed to bring my chair out of safety concerns (really?!). This is a good alternative and works almost as well as the full ball rolling chair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: cmango

customer_reviews.title: Not just for sitting!
customer_reviews.text: I got this over the summer because I sit all day but I have a bad back. I thought this would help. I found that it didn't help and sometimes hurt so I chalked it up to another wasted product. Well, our offices got remodeled and the company provided us with adjustable work stations so I can either sit or stand. I stand most of the time now and I often take my shoes off and stand and try to balance on this thing. It provides a pretty good calf workout! No longer a waste of space and money.
customer_reviews.author: papaya73

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want butt pain.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have back problems and also because I wanted to be a bit higher up in my chair. This thing hurts my butt. I thought it just took some getting used to, but no, after 2 weeks, still every single day I would get up and think, "Yep, my butt hurts." So now it is on the floor under my desk and I rest my feet on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT ON A FINISHED WOOD CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: This balance disc worked out great when I had to start working from home due to COVID-19. Unfortunately I was using one of my brand new kitchen chairs that I'd had for a month. Less that four weeks after using the disc, I needed to stand on the chair to reach something only to discover that when I tried to remove it, the disc was literally glued to my chair. I had to peel it off and the finish was gummy. Ruined my chair. Other than that...it did make the chair more comfortable! Gaiam, would you like to reimburse me for the replacement chair I had to purchase?
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with pump
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated with no air pump. Don’t think you can use one you already have on hand... I broke the metal piece of mine trying to inflate this. Now I have two useless pieces of plastic and a broken air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for work
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put on my desk chair in my office (which I sit on for 9 hours a day...). One of my coworkers has a balance ball that I sat on for a few days and loved, so I got this for myself as a smaller/less obtrusive alternative. I much prefer sitting on the balance ball as it does better things for my posture (and is more fun) but this is a good alternative and I do notice a difference in sitting on this versus sitting on the regular office chair. I have not yet tried any balance exercises using this, I exclusively have used it to promote active sitting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mass

customer_reviews.title: You may receive a used product.
customer_reviews.text: Came literally in a plastic bag as if it was used. No instructions, no needle, NOTHING. This after waiting a month because the first never arrived. Which I’m not really upset about considering what’s going on in the world. Just the icing on a sad cake. I’ve tried this product before after borrowing for about a week. I really liked it. But I received some used garbage. Will be returning once I’m able.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazed
customer_reviews.text: I am truly amazed at how well this is working. I sit working for 8 hours a day and I felt like my leg circulation was poor. I’ve have problems with my feet because of it. Just one day using this cushion and I already feel a difference! I feel the burn in my abs and the backs of my thighs. Seriously did not expect that. And, if nothing else it sits me up taller, which is good because I’m short. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I give this a two-bun approval!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved the chair/ball but was afraid to fall on my butt if the stupid thing popped. This thing is awesome and I noticed a difference the first time using it (replaced memory foam seat cushion (waste of money)). My back wasn't strained, my neck and shoulders felt good, and my 'core' was worked a little as well from the balance of it all. I ordered more for the rest of the seats in my life. And, I'm gonna try one on the bleachers at a baseball game next.
customer_reviews.author: crasagam

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: This thing first of all, looked nothing like the photo except for the color. The "rings" were not centered. It wasn't "rounded". It was shocked to pull out a flimsy mostly flat...thing. I still decided to take it to work and give it a try. It was sooooo slippery I couldn't use it. I've used the Gaiam exercise ball chair and this thing doesn't come close to a portable replication.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna L. Hetz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for those with back problems!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat cushion! I use it at work since I sit behind a desk all day. I go to a chiropractor and since I’ve started sitting on this wobble seat cushion, he tells me my hips are less out of line than they used to be! I recommend this to anyone. Other reviews said it appeared to be under-inflated when they got it. I thought the same thing, but when you sit on it, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, not very "user friendly"
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. I sit all day but a full yoga ball chair would require all sorts of medical accommodations. This is subtle and effective. Inflating is easy. Deflating is IMPOSSIBLE. I wanted to let some of the air out, even with the needle (which promptly broke), I could not get the slightest bit of air out. Hopefully a replacement needle will help.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Made my neck hurt
customer_reviews.text: By the end of the day my neck was very sore. I does come barely inflated and I tried it like that. I used my bike pump and the pin they provide but it did not inflate more that I could tell. It is still quite flat. But the directions say that your legs should be a 90 degrees and they were. So I didn't see the need to inflate anyway. But I can see why people complain about it being flat. I was really looking forward to this. I wish it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: iblafin

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: This product came deflated with no way to inflate as it comes with no other pieces and it is clearly used. It arrived filthy and with a multitude of scuff marks all over the bottom that don’t come off. The pics don’t capture the the scratches well. They. Are. Everywhere. It looks like someone used it and had it on the floor. Disgusting of them to sell this product as new!!! It is CLEARLY not new. What a waste of time and money!!!
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it unless you can’t smell
customer_reviews.text: Omg it stinks up the entire room. You will never get the stink out. It even transfers to your pants. I took it off the chair and no longer use it because of the smell and the chair STILL stinks and I can still smell it on my pants when I’m not even in the chair. I will never use it again and not sure how I can get the terrible smell out of my leather chair.
customer_reviews.author: JRenee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my back
customer_reviews.text: Raises me up so I don't have to scrunch my shoulders to use my keyboard. More important it helps me to sit up straight. Move it back on the chair seat to tilt forward almost like a kneel chair. Center it to put seatbones in the middle to use your core muscles to sit upright. It makes good posture easy. I really like this cushion and just ordered one for home as well. Some reviewers had problems with pumping it up. Mine was slightly underinflated and I used the needle provided with my standard cheapo foot pump. It took just several pumps. You do have to push the "needle" all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: This is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for home & one for my office chair. Sat on it all day yesterday at work & it's pretty comfy. I sit for at least 8 hrs a day at work & my hips/ lower back were getting stiff when I would get up to walk around...I'd have to go stretch in the bathroom & it would even be painful to sleep at night. This Really helped a lot. My hips & lower back felt so much better yesterday, even just after one use. I am very happy with this purchase!!! I was going to bring in my stability ball but it wouldn't have worked with my desk. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M 🐑

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS. Immediate back pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: On day 1 I could already tell a difference in my pain. Day three and it's sturdy, not deflating. Working from home and just using some of the furniture I have sitting for hours on end was causing a lot of discomfort in my back and my shoulders. Instead of purchasing an expensive chair I purchased this. And I can already tell a big difference, and I'm so happy with this purchase. Definitely one of the best things I've gotten in a long time for my health. Can't recommend it enough. Save the money on expensive ball chairs and get this.
customer_reviews.author: Billychic

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the results of this item and I missed the return window. Was given for a gift so did t have time to try it out before the return window closed. No matter the amount of air I put in it, very uncomfortable! Even tried using it to stand on...
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cadeau

customer_reviews.title: NO CUSTOMER CARE= RETURNED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product includes a needle for air pump, but no air pump. The product does not feature a companion air pump (included or for purchase). Customer service basically told me "too bad for you." I'm returning this thing and buying from another manufacturer-- for the same price-- that includes the necessary air pump. Gaiam, you really need to step up your customer care.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT. GREAT PRICE. AMAZING RESULTS.
customer_reviews.text: BEST BUY. I absolutely love this thing. I read the reviews and then decided to try it out. I sit all day at my desk with serious back pain and this was such a relief. Definitely worth the buy. Great product for those who sit long hours at the desk. VERY worth the price! My co-workers are asking me about it, testing it out, and purchasing themselves!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first...
customer_reviews.text: I spend long hours at my desk. I know my posture is suffering and I have yet to invest in an expensive ergonomic chair. This strange inflated disc has immediately made a difference. It more or less forces you to sit correctly. It takes a bit of getting used to but it's not uncomfortable. I really bought this because the padding on my chair was shot and it looked better than just throwing a cheap pillow on the chair. A good investment and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer doesn't stand behind item
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. 1 for me and 1 for someone else. The one I purchased as a gift didn't work out. The recipient tried it for 45 days because we hoped it would work but there was never any improvement. I tried to return it to Amazon but the return window had closed so Amazon referred me to Gaaiam. I contacted Gaiam who told me to contact Amazon. Obviously neither of them are going to refund my money so my advice is not to purchase Gaiam products but if you do, return them in under 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: knitty pants

customer_reviews.title: Wobble while you work.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first active seating endeavor so I have nothing to compare it to. That said, I like it. It makes me sit up straighter, but after a while I catch myself slouching so it's not the perfect anti-slouch device. My wife liked mine so I bought one for her. It does what I bought it to do, so I gave it 5 stars. Oh, it's not super inflated, but it does wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Nene M.

customer_reviews.title: Better quality seat cushions on the market
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my bottom Size 12, quite uncomfortable, cold, leaves back hurting after 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to sit on top of my deflated Gaiam stool until I can afford the Coreseat one to replace it. I can sit almost all day on these without getting a sore back or butt. So far so good - it feels just as good as the original stool at much less cost. I actually appreciate that they do not include a pump with this, as a lot of people already have them and it is so much more plastic waste. If you neee one, buy it. They're cheap. I got a standard chair seat cover on Amazon as well to put over it and it looks so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Awful
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It only makes the issues I bought it for even worse. My butt goes numb while sitting on it and it makes my thighs hurt. Plus the large ridges on top make it even more uncomfortable to sit on. It's also causing my tailbone pain to return. The one good thing it does is make me stand up more since it's so uncomfortable. I'm returning it as we speak. It also smells bad...
customer_reviews.author: Luke F.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to balance ball chair for remote learning
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged with a needle for inflation (no pump- we used a bike pump). It needed some air before we put it into service. Since receipt, it has seen a few weeks of use by an energetic child for remote learning. We have also used it for floor sitting activities. It has held up well to the abuse and is a great, space saving, easy to clean, cheap option vs. an actual balance ball chair. Will try to update at the end of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Frigid863

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make sitting in a desk chair more tolerable. I have sciatica from too much work sitting. It didn't help & actually made it a bit worse. Tried several different firmnesses. I have an exercise ball that I use to good effect, it's just not tall enough, so I thought this would be the same, just easier to adapt with a chair. Nope. Back to the ball. The ball is better for core anyway because you have to work harder using it. The instructions say it's ready to go out of the box. Mine was nearly completely deflated. Not sure what that's about. Put some air in & it held well. Just wasn't the solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: High quality product & works well
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this product through the Gaiam website, but Fedex lost my package, so I got a refund and ordered it off of Amazon. It was the same price as the Gaiam website, but the shipping was lower! I got it and right out of the package, it is usable and inflated. Mine is not inflated all the way, but it's enough to provide support for your lower back and allow you to move your hips around while you are sitting. This helps lessen the pain from sitting for long periods of time. I ordered this because I am teaching from home and it helps a lot during instruction and meetings with students/administrators! :-)
customer_reviews.author: kconn88

customer_reviews.title: Realse of tight glutes and lower back !!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the ball got it on thanksgiving on lighting sale. Had high hopes for relase in my glutes periformus and lowerback. After siting on it for two hours I already have some wonderful muscle sore-ness!! Looking at getting one for my mother who has tight glutes and gets sciatica pain. Although looked a little sketchy out of the box , it was perfctly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with working from home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me while working from home in a seated position all day. I had tried a yoga ball before, but found it was not stable enough when I was trying to do detailed work. This air pillow has a low profile, but provides just enough movement so your body doesn't stay in any one position for too long. The only downside is that it feels cold when I'm wearing shorts, so I put a regular cotton pillow case on it.
customer_reviews.author: E-reader

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My nutritionist highly recommended this. It feels interesting and for the first hour or so it’s not too bad. You have to adjust your chair so you don’t strain your neck. After an hour my back begins to bother me. So it’s the opposite of what it should do. I liked the movement but maybe it’s just to hard. Not sure. I am going to try the ball version. For an an hour or two it might feel better.
customer_reviews.author: mbear

customer_reviews.title: The Gaiam Balance Disc Wobble Cushion Stability Core Trainer for Home or Office Desk Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the balance disc cushion because I spend most of my day working at desk using a laptop and thought this may help with my posture. Unfortunately,the item arrived obviously used. The item appeared worn; marked and scratched; and there were even strands of hair stuck to the bottom. I'm unable to comment on the effectiveness of the item because I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would keep, except it ruined the finish of the chair we put it on  :(
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this cushion made our wooden dining chair much more comfortable (as it was pressed into service in a makeshift home office during shelter-in-place), but it stuck to the seat of the chair and ruined the finish! Foolishly we tried it on another chair and had the same result. Wet paper towels, baby wipes, and Lysol wipes haven't cleaned/fixed it so I guess we'll have to use something more specialized. Ours are very normal midrange wood dining chairs, and we've never had issues with the finish before, so I think this was something about the cushion. We'd return it but the return window has closed so now we're stuck with it (literally).
customer_reviews.author: M&K

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a stability ball
customer_reviews.text: I work at a desk all day, the stability ball didn't work for me because I would use it for a little bit, but I couldn't move around my office, I'd have to get off it and sit back down on it. This is great because it sits on my chair and I'm able to swivel around my office and move around a bit at my desk! I sit up straight and am engaged in the core and still get the same benefits as the ball...this is so much better, best purchase in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Too little air!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I don't weigh enough for this one but I saw a chiropractor who had these in his office and I found great relief from them while doing exercises. When this one arrived I noticed it was larger in diameter and I couldn't balance as well as the previous ones that I have used. The item has a weird smell and it seems like it has been previously used as well. Not extremely happy with my purchase and may be returning this one. Going to try using it with different techniques as I suffer from neck pain at the moment and feel I need to strengthen my core to find more relief.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Recommend purchasing from Gaiam website
customer_reviews.text: This review is not for Gaiam Wobble. This review is for purchasing this product on Amazon. Unlike typical high quality condition that I have come to expect from Gaiam, this product arrived in poor packaging and used condition that demonstrate wear and tear from repeated use. I recommend purchasing Gaiam products directly from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Franc

customer_reviews.title: Potentially useful for posture or balancing, but beware of back pain possibilities
customer_reviews.text: First one I received from warehouse was limp and uninflatable. Exchanged it for one that had a working valve and separately bought a hand pump (Tonunu $ 5.95) to adjust inflation. I had to drop my chair to lowest level to obtain recommended right angle bent knee position, so if your inseam is less than 28" and you won't be wearing shoes this may not be the cushion for you. Despite a reasonably strong core, sitting correctly caused lower back pain that I haven't had for years . If you have an air pump, you could adjust the cushion for either sitting or depending on your weight, balance practice.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: It looked as described but definitely defective and broken when I got it.. Most of the products have been great so that 1 in a million bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Made my back hurt
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few days and it aggravates my sciatica.
customer_reviews.author: PAflyer

customer_reviews.title: Received used product
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly disgusted because I received a used product. The disc is smudgy has actual foot prints on it and it’s deflated. I cannot believe that Gaiam actually thought that it was OK to send a product like this in this condition to a customer. Not only has this been extremely inconvenient as I will now have to ship back the product, I have to wait even longer to go through their customer service dept to get a replacement. I saw another guy’s review that he received a used product, and I thought that would never happen to me – but it did. Also shame on the disgusting person who sent this back in this condition. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella B.

customer_reviews.title: More or less it does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: The unit does provide the instability that activates your core. You have to be particular about what chair you put it on or it won’t be stable enough and can actually hurt your back. The textured top designed obviously to prevent you from slipping can be a bit uncomfortable. I haven’t utilized it as a device to stand on to improve balance which certainly as you age is a positive thing. When I do I’ll update my review. All in all I would say it does what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: Impulsebuyer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Too large.
customer_reviews.text: When sitting, the lines on the disc tend to dig in over time, and in general my tailbone starts to hurt. I've also not noticed any improvement after using it daily for about a month. I've been kneeling on it a few times this week and my butt has become super duper sore, so I imagine if you were to use it for standing you'd actually work out some. However, it is too large for any bags I own to bring it back and forth from home to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible, but works!
customer_reviews.text: It works well but the smell is sooo strong and horrible. Smells of really strong chemical...even after wiping it with antibacterial wipes. The smell seeped into my chair cushion too and was so distracting while I worked. Had to Lysol my chair then put a towel over the wobble cushion and used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rittymanee

customer_reviews.title: Smelly product
customer_reviews.text: Note that the inflating pin is taped to the box - inside the box. Unfortunately, this wobble cushion is too smelly for me to feel comfortable using it. It makes the room smell of chemicals and also left a smelly and slightly shiny residue on the wooden chair on which it was placed. I've already recycled the box, or I'd return it. Sign me, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NortheastNaturalist

customer_reviews.title: Great for working at home
customer_reviews.text: With Covid-19 hitting us like a load of bricks I was spending more time in an uncomfortable desk chair at home and my back, shoulders, and neck were paying the price. I purchased this stabilizer and it has been one of the best things I have done in a long time. Highly recommend to anyone who needs additional core support when sitting for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Akinder Garden

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this item arrived fully inflated! I thought it seemed under-inflated when I pulled it out of the box, but I was glad that it came with a nozzle for a pump (not included) and I decided to try it as-is. It works perfectly. A MUCH better and more attractive option than a full exercise ball, which would have required a more expensive, ugly rolling stand. Definitely as portable as any pillow, I'll probably try to use this elsewhere besides just my office, but I already feel my posture improved and I've only used it for a couple days!
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Made my lower back ache
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this, but after giving it a month I can say it’s a no from me dawg. I tried using it all day, in intervals throughout the day and it still just didn’t work for me. My lower back and hips ached so bad whenever I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Pooy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am forever annoyed that my desk is designed to sit at and write, not to access a keyboard. My chair does not adjust high enough to compensate. The Gaiam Balance Disc solves this problem AND give me a dynamic surface to reduce the stiffness associated with long spans of sitting. Finally!! Side note, I purchased one from Amazon Warehouse listed as "used good". It looks as though it was used for all of 30 seconds. That's 6$ in my pocket and a perfectly good item given a second life. BOOM!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Vezina

customer_reviews.title: helps to work the core
customer_reviews.text: purchased the black based on positive reviews. Wanted a color but was afraid as some reviewers said there were scratches on theirs? It does seem to help my lower back & glutes. I sit all day using a backrest as well, Sitting on this reminds me to sit up straight. When I received it, It looked as if it did not have enough air, however, I read the directions and used it as is, and found that it was the perfect amount of air for me. I am 5' 2 1/2". I purchased 2, one for work & one for home while paying bills at my desk. I also recommended it to a coworker. She purchased gray and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stay active at the office!
customer_reviews.text: I am a young professional who went from walking around campus to sitting at a desk for 8 hours a day. The first day I used this product, I could feel my abs working after 3 hours of sitting. It has gained a lot of positive attention around the office. DISCLAIMER- I got this product without much air in it and had to purchase a separate pump for around $5. I still gave this product a 5 because I knew it wouldn't come with a pump when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dix

customer_reviews.title: This is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is amazing! I am at a desk job from 8-10 hours a day. My back and hip just ached by the time the day was over. I have been using this for 5 days and I can’t tell you how much better I feel! This was the best $20 I have spent. I have showed it off at work and 3 of my coworkers have ordered or will be ordering it! My mom is getting one too! If you have to sit a desk or do a lot of sitting this helps so much! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MBarnfield

customer_reviews.title: Strong unpleasant smell not going away
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about 1.5 months and the very strong plasticy/rubbery odor is not going away. It's so strong it actually burns my nose. Furthermore, I do not feel any real benefit for core strengthening, and I do believe I have it properly inflated. I have to consciously make myself shift back and forth, which doesn't last as I get engrossed in my work and end up sitting still. There may be some minor balancing that I'm not conscious of. Wish I could return it...
customer_reviews.author: cat e

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it because of wanting to strengthen my core muscles since they're so important. Some of the reviews cautioned people to use it for only a few minutes at first because it would cause discomfort. Apparently I already had great tone in my core muscles because sitting on it for extended periods of time had no negative effects. I keep the cushion on my chair at the kitchen table -- where I sit when also using my laptop -- and I consider it a 'maintenance' tool. Unexpected side benefit: my posture is greatly improved since I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Mediterranean chick

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an actual wobble chair at my office, but wanted something with a similar feel for my work from home days, (still going in to the office once or twice a week, but I didn't want to be lugging the wobble chair back & forth) - so I bought this cushion. I love it. I just plopped it on my home office chair and it feels much better for my posture, lower back and overall concentration. When my core is engaged - I'M engaged! Mine did not come with a pin or pump, but was adequately inflated upon unboxing. I like it just a little squishy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my legs go numb???
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 5 days or so and I have yet to find a way to sit on it that doesn't make my legs go numb. I have tried putting my legs up on something to they are at perfect right angles. Also I have tried sitting forward or back farther. Still no good. Maybe it is because I am a larger woman? Not sure. Just disappointed that it makes things worse and I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Read Fine Print - No Pump Included
customer_reviews.text: The Disc comes partially inflated with only the puncture tip to use on a pump. I missed the fine print saying this doesn’t come with the actual pump. If you are like me and don’t have a spare hand pump just hanging around this renders the purchase totally useless right out of the box. I hope this saves someone from doing what I did and not realizing till after purchase. They totally cheaped out not including one seeing as this is a vital necessity to use the item properly.
customer_reviews.author: SassFaceSis

customer_reviews.title: Can't use on opening...why?
customer_reviews.text: Why would I be sent a product that is unusable out of the box? It came uninflated which meant prior to using I had to buy a pump inflator to use it. I can understand that over time it could lose air and I may someday have to buy an inflator, but at least out of the box it should be usable. Well, other than that after I got it pumped up I like the product. It does what it says and is comfortable to use. Just be buy and inflator at the same time if you want to use it, which also adds to the initial cost.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: FEEL BETTER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my lower back from sitting all day at a desk. I noticed it has improved my posture, lower back pain is gone and my bottom end does not feel soar. It fits perfect on any chair and I have noticed that a couple of ladies in office are using them to. They and myself feel better through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ron-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Really big
customer_reviews.text: I was told by my physical therapist that I needed to purchase one of these since I sit down all day at work. I didn't realize that when I purchased this that it was so big - it's HUGE. The one at my physical therapists office was a lot smaller. Since I've used both, I will say that I prefer the larger size. I don't feel like I'm going to pop it as easily (I know it won't pop that easily, but still).
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Air pump wasn't included
customer_reviews.text: I just got the disc and it's somewhat blown up, so I believe I should be fine. However, it is supposed to come with a needle to inflate it. There isn't one. Perhaps my box was used. Maybe it was a mistake. Either way, be prepared to not have an air pump in case you want it fuller. As for pain relief etc, just began trying it. I can definitely feel it in my core, but it's starting to agitate my SI joint. This may end up being returned. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Groot of the Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: Oddly, caused more pain than it relieved
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office chair to relieve tailbone pain and add cushion to the seat. I ended up removing it several days later. It actually caused MORE tailbone pain, quicker than before. I used it for several days thinking I just needed to adjust to it, but I ended up throwing it in a closet. (Too late to return it.)
customer_reviews.author: Danewfixer

customer_reviews.title: It does come a bit dirty, but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews that, oddly, this thing does arrive kind of dirty. I don't know what's up with the production process or what...however, I will say that the pain I was experiencing because of nerve pinching appears to have stopped since using this. I stick it on any chair that I'm spending a long period of time, especially when I'm working. It's definitely worth the $16.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Healing my Sciatica
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me get back on the road to health. I purchased this to drive a long distance trip. The benefits of driving with it were stunning, and I never would have believed that such an improvement would be possible. It will feel unstable at first, but that is the point! It gently but effectively encourages you to use your core muscles while sitting, thereby encouraging stability and flexibility in the body. Best 20 bucks I have ever spent on a health care product, bar none.
customer_reviews.author: Gaudete

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my chairs!
customer_reviews.text: This product completely ruined my wooden chair. I'm not sure what is on the rubber, but when I lifted up the ball, it took the finish off of my wood and left on big circle with a bunch of other smaller circles in it. I tried cleaning and polishing the bench, but to no avail. I'm extremely disappointed. I then moved this to my desk chair, where it also left marks. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no pump included
customer_reviews.text: product is nice but it needed a little more air and I'm surprised there is no pump. most of these products of similar kind has a pump. so its just a given that they should include a pump. the Gaiam sheet says no pump or needle included.. I think Gaiam should get it more together with their product..and just as i was braking up the box i found a needle.. lol so small they should have taped it to a piece of card board or something. what good is the needle with out the pump lol. silly..
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Mimics a full size exercise ball very well
customer_reviews.text: We used to be able to sit on exercise balls at our work desk until someone fell off of theirs and now no one is allowed to have them. This is a much smaller version of those balls but provides the same benefits. My back is not fatigued or sore by the end of the day and I feel much more energized when I leave work. I thought it was a bit flat and needed more air when I got it but it appears that the movement is what keeps your core engaged. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cushion for the working drummer
customer_reviews.text: I can now sit for hours without any worries of lower Back pain while playing my drums this is crazy always suffered from lower back pain for over 40 years now nothing while playing also I noticed My stomach getting harder I actually bought this For my wife but she didn’t need any longer so before I decided to throw it out I said let me try This on my drum seat and the rest is history glad I didn’t throw it out to all drummers you better get this air cushion it will help you last behind your kit Way longer without any back pain then without it
customer_reviews.author: Skills! Money!!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cushion for those who slouch
customer_reviews.text: I have an office job where I sit for about 8.5 of my 9 hours every day. I was going to buy the balance ball chair but am self conscious about how much junk my coworkers would talk about me. This cushion gives me what I want and is discrete enough that people can't tell I am sitting on it. I now sit straight up all day, can't slouch with this thing, not much at least. This is very comfortable even after several straight hours of sitting, great to have if you sit al day.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: After hesistantly trying, Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this into my office with good intentions of using it because I know I don't have the best posture. It sat there in the bag for a couple weeks. Then one day I had some pretty bad lower back pain and figured why not? Instantly! relief - I am sitting better and more comfortably in my office chair and my lower back doesn't hurt nearly as much. The partial inflation works great as you move around and talk to people because it allows for weight adjustments. Worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Ell

customer_reviews.title: Desk Job Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I had found one of these at TJ Maxx and tried it out for my desk job. Love it! It helps take pressure off my back and helps me engage my core while I’m sitting all day. I inflated mine once and never had to again, which is very impressive—can’t say the same for other balance ball type products. I purchased a second cushion on Amazon for my boyfriend, since his back doesn’t appreciate the desk job either, and he said it does help take pressure off his lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kate

customer_reviews.title: Was not for me - possibly defective
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back. Product did not hold air (Maybe I received a defective one) and a separate air pump is needed to inflate. I was using this at work and didn’t want to buy another product to keep at work to keep it properly inflated. Also, when I would sit down on it, it made a sound as if I had just passed gas. Lol. I gave it a week of use before sending it back.....Just wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bittie

customer_reviews.title: Back Savior
customer_reviews.text: After months of sitting in an old desk chair and trying a variety of pillows to cushion it and provide support, I gave this a try to see if it would improve the tense aching muscles in my lower back. Wow. The first two days I had a different kind of stiff pain in my back right around the bottom of my ribs, likely where it was activating my core, but since then I have had zero pain. It is amazing. I'm seriously in love. Even when I finally go back to an office I will be taking this with me.
customer_reviews.author: F. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Makes a real difference if you're seated a lot
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased with this wobble cushion and recommend it, if you find you need to sit at a desk for long. (I still get up and stretch/exercise for 10 minutes out of the hour, as my doctor recommends.) You can feel the muscles in your hips and lower back making minor adjustments as you shift, and to me it seems like these small movements are safer and more beneficial than the whole-body exercises I still do daily. The drawback for me is that I need a bicycle pump to re-inflate. So far it's fine, though.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Welt

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable at work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cuz I sit all day for work and have a flat hind end. There is just enough cush that my butt bones don't get sore by the end of my shift any more. And it's supposed to be good for your core muscles. I'm sure it is if you use it for that purpose, but I bought it to relieve my pain in the butt! Down side is the rubber/plastic bag chemical smell. I bought a thick cover that blocks that. Now it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Comes Half Inflated, wobbly feel
customer_reviews.text: This cushion comes half inflated and does NOT look like the photo shown which obviously is showing fully inflated. Instructions say it’s ready to be used but can be inflated for individual comfort. I was going to inflate it but decided to try it first. Half inflate is plenty of cushion as I felt quite wobbly in it. Haven’t felt the benefits yet in terms of back or tailbone but it’s comfy. Been using for one week. Your hips will definitely be wobble around.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for; returned.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use on my work chair. I was hoping this would be like the top of a balance ball, but the plastic was much thicker and harder and hurt my tush after a short time. It was fun to wobble around, which I was hoping would help my hips, but I can wiggle around in the same way on a regular cushion if I make a conscious effort. I would've liked it better if the top was was thinner like a balance ball. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Takes pressure off of spine
customer_reviews.text: I sit on this at work and it is excellent for taking pressure off my spine, especially with an 8 hr desk job. It's more professional looking than the ball chair. My only complaint is this looked like a used disc, but it hasn't impacted the performance of the disc,so I didn't bother with returning it for a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: Reenie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with posture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my chair at my office with the hope that using it would help improve my posture. With consistent use, I believe it could. I like that it helps me focus on core stability. My only complaint is that after using it all day, one of my legs tends to go numb. But of you have a decent chair and are looking for something to help you focus on stability and posture, I believe this disc could be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part, Needle to inflate.  Manual says included, but it is missing.
customer_reviews.text: Manual for this Product says to use inflate if Air is not enough and Needle is included. However, it is missing Needle Part.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief.
customer_reviews.text: Got this too help with posture and with core building. This is a highly adaptable alternative to a full size yoga ball. I use it on my office chair, on the couch, and at the dinner table. It is no substitute for planks and stretches, for sure, but my chronic back pain has seen a massive decrease since I began using it. Don't like the amount of wobble? Inflate in seconds with a standard ball pump needle. Too much pressure on your tailbone? Deflate to preference. Since setting it up weeks ago, I have not had to reinflate it once. YMMV, but I am extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WillFaust

customer_reviews.title: Activate your core, improve your posture.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to work my core and improve balance while sitting in front of a computer for work all day. Works great! Not sure why they ask for ratings for stability and pain relief because the point is to create instability so your core is active. Expect some back pain the first few weeks as your core gets stronger. You may want to start with a couple hours a day at first and work your way up. I average 8 hours per day. Your abs will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you sitting straight
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised-keeps me sitting up straight. I still haven't found the perfect inflation level as it starts to become hard to sit on after a while. Luckily, I just raise my desk and stand at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Ruined My Chair — Caution!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see I’m the picture it took off the finish of my dining chair in big chunks — the chair and the disk were all sticky. It hadn’t gotten wet nor had it even been sat on much. I am hesitant to put it on my office chair lest it ruin it as well, but I am outside h th I return window so I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I can't inflate it
customer_reviews.text: This stability disc is a good size to put on a chair or stand on. The big issue is that I can't inflate it. I broke one inflator needle trying to push it in even after lubricating it. I'm afraid to try again for fear the needle will go through the other side or break off inside.
customer_reviews.author: RM44G

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for a Yoga Ball
customer_reviews.text: I had been sitting on a yoga ball, but found it was awkward and not easily matched to whatever desk or surface I needed to use at work. This was a great way to help my hip ( I have a sciatica issue where my leg falls asleep at work) without needing to worry about what chair I was sitting on. I use it at home when I play board games and sew as well & this effect is the same! Only reason I took 1 star off sturdiness is because you need to keep a pump nearby to refill with air more frequently than a yoga ball I think.
customer_reviews.author: kathy beyerle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product if I could air it up some. But after multiple attempts at trying to pump air into it and then breaking the provided needle attachment I give up. It's like there is something in there stopping the flow of air getting inside.
customer_reviews.author: Steph R

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the inflation needle - can't even use it.
customer_reviews.text: The package says to use the included inflation needle to inflate the cushion. My package did not come with the inflation needle and I am not going to go out and buy one - so I guess I will return the item and request a refund. Frustrating and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Werkele

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because I have a lot of back pain due to a car accident I had a few years ago. Not only does this help when I have back pain but after using this daily I started to feel my posture get better and my back straighten up again.
customer_reviews.author: music31

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my work chair. I have been sitting on a gel cushion and it just wasn't giving me the comfort and height that I needed. I like to use a cushion to boost me alittle in my chair as well as for comfort. This disc is fantastic. Came already inflated but with an inflation needle for when it will need a little more air. It raises me up to a nice height and is very comfortable. Really happy with it. I work at a school and have already had two other staff members sit in my chair and they both want one. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN CIPOLLONE

customer_reviews.title: package
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. I received a clearly used product that you are supposed to sit on. Bottom is worn, the inflation opening is scratched around the surface and the product arrived pretty heavily deflated. It seems pretty clear that somebody got the product, used it, didn't like it and returned it and Gaima then sent it to me. I had nothing to give her so I cleaned it the best I could and gave it to her. She seems to like it but I was very upset to give it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Cm

product_meta.title: Gaiam Balance Disc Wobble Cushion Stability Core Trainer for Home or Office Desk Chair & Kids Alternative Classroom Sensory Wiggle Seat
product_meta.description: Turn any chair or seat into an active one by placing the disc on top to add instability and strengthen your core. This posture-improving inflatable 16" Balance Disc will engage your abs and core muscles while you sit. Even works outdoors for a quick seat or on hardwood or carpet flooring. Great for a meditation seat or wherever you need a little extra cushion. By controlling the firmness of the cushion, you can adapt it to your fitness needs and comfortability. Can also be used for strengthening exercises in or out of your chair
feature_bullets: Active seating: Place the disc on top of almost any chair or seat to add instability to strengthen your core while improving posture and sitting comfortably - great for office desk chairs
Versatile cushion: Use balance disc with a variety of strength and balance exercises, in or out of a chair, to increase core strength and balance
Meditation cushion: Works great as meditation seat or wherever you need a little extra cushion - also effective as a 'chill chair' for young children and active kids

Alternative seat for active kids: Great for classroom aged children at home or in the classroom as an outlet for hyper or ADHD kids allowing them to release excess energy while staying engaged and focused longer

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
